welcome.title: Welcome to ReplyStack!
welcome.description: Discover how to respond to your customer reviews 10x faster with AI. Let us guide you through the essential features.

transition.title: Great job!
transition.description: You've completed the essential tour. Would you like to discover additional features?

dashboardLink.title: Dashboard
dashboardLink.description: Your main dashboard. Get a quick overview of your activity, statistics, and remaining quota at a glance.

reviewsLink.title: Reviews
reviewsLink.description: Access all your customer reviews here. See pending reviews that need responses and manage your reply workflow.

historyLink.title: History
historyLink.description: View all your past AI-generated replies. Search, filter, and reuse successful response templates.

dashboardStats.title: Your Statistics
dashboardStats.description: Track your AI-generated replies at a glance. Monitor your remaining quota, daily activity, and overall performance.

extensionCta.title: Browser Extension
extensionCta.description: Install our Chrome or Firefox extension to generate AI replies directly on review platforms like Google Business, TripAdvisor, and more.

responseStyle.title: Response Style
responseStyle.description: Customize how your AI responds to reviews. Set your preferred tone, add business context, and create personalized reply templates.

settingsLink.title: Settings
settingsLink.description: Manage your account settings, response preferences, connected platforms, and subscription details.

themeToggle.title: Theme Toggle
themeToggle.description: Switch between light and dark mode for a comfortable viewing experience day or night.

quotaBar.title: Usage Quota
quotaBar.description: Keep track of your monthly reply quota. When running low, consider upgrading your plan for unlimited responses.

userProfile.title: Your Profile
userProfile.description: Access your profile information, current plan details, and quickly log out from your account.
